info.title: BBC Nitro API
info.description: BBC Nitro is the BBC's application programming interface (API) for BBC Programmes Metadata.

get.description: Start here for programmes metadata: Brands, Series, Episodes and Clips

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Sort direction

parameters.name: mixin
parameters.description: Mixin

parameters.name: audio_described
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes that are audio-described

parameters.name: availability
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes that have availability

parameters.name: availability_entity_type
parameters.description: additional filter when availability=available

parameters.name: availability_type
parameters.description: filter for a subset of programmes that are available for a given type

parameters.name: children_of
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes that have PID as immediate parent

parameters.name: descendants_of
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes that have PID as ancestor

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes that have given duration

parameters.name: entity_type
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes that have given entity type

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes with format

parameters.name: genre
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes with genre

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes which belong to the given group pid

parameters.name: initial_letter
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes with title beginning with initial letter librarian style (ignoring leading 'The', 'An' (Welsh), etc) 0-9 a-z

parameters.name: initial_letter_end
parameters.description: Programmes with (librarian) titles whose initial letter is equal/before given letter. Use with initial_letter_start for a range

parameters.name: initial_letter_start
parameters.description: Programmes with (librarian) titles whose initial letter is equal/after given letter. Use with initial_letter_end for range.

parameters.name: initial_letter_strict
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes with title beginning with initial letter

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes with linked to versions which have the given item pids

parameters.name: master_brand
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes with master_brand

parameters.name: media_set
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes with media set

parameters.name: media_type
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes with media type

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: which page of results to return

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: number of results in each page

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: filter for programmes by partner ID

parameters.name: partner_pid
parameters.description: filter for programmes by partner PID

parameters.name: people
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes with contributions by given people PID

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes having given PID

parameters.name: promoted_for
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes which are promoted for given service

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

parameters.name: signed
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes that are signed

parameters.name: tag_name
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes with tag

parameters.name: tag_scheme
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes with a tag

parameters.name: tleo
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes that are TLEOs

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes with given PID as one of their versions

get.description: Discover details of on-demand availability for programmes and their versions

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Sort direction

parameters.name: availability
parameters.description: filter for subset of availabilities

parameters.name: descendants_of
parameters.description: filter for subset of availabilities that have PID as ancestor

parameters.name: media_set
parameters.description: filter for subset of availabilities with media set

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: which page of results to return

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: number of results in each page

parameters.name: territory
parameters.description: filter for availabilities in given territory

get.description: Build schedules and find metadata for TV and radio broadcasts

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Sort direction

parameters.name: mixin
parameters.description: Mixin

parameters.name: authority
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that have given authority

parameters.name: descendants_of
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that are descendants of the given programme PID

parameters.name: end_from
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that end on or later than the specified datetime

parameters.name: end_to
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that end on or earlier than the specified datetime

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that are classified in the given format ID

parameters.name: genre
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that are classified in the given genre ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that have given identifier

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts with the given item performed on it

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: which page of results to return

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: number of results in each page

parameters.name: people
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that have given contributor

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts having given PID

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

parameters.name: schedule_day
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that start on the specified day (BBC time)

parameters.name: schedule_day_from
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that start on or after the specified day (BBC time)

parameters.name: schedule_day_to
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that start on or before the specified day (BBC time)

parameters.name: service_master_brand
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts with given service master brand

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that are on the specified linear service

parameters.name: start_from
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that start on or later than the specified datetime

parameters.name: start_to
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that start on or earlier than the specified datetime

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts with given PID as their parent version

get.description: Find metadata for curated groups: seasons, collections, galleries or franchises

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Sort direction

parameters.name: mixin
parameters.description: Mixin

parameters.name: for_descendants_of
parameters.description: filter for groups related to given programme or its descendants

parameters.name: for_programme
parameters.description: filter for subset of groups directly related to a given programme

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: filter for subset of groups which belong to the given group pid

parameters.name: group_type
parameters.description: filter for subset of groups that have the given group type

parameters.name: member
parameters.description: filter for subset of groups which contain an entity with the given pid as a member

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: which page of results to return

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: number of results in each page

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: filter for groups by partner ID

parameters.name: partner_pid
parameters.description: filter for groups by partner PID

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: filter for subset of seasons, collections, galleries or franchises having given PID

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: filter for subset of groups matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Sort direction

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: filter for images belonging to the given group (i.e. Gallery)

parameters.name: image_type
parameters.description: filter for images by type

parameters.name: is_alternate_image_for
parameters.description: filter for alternate images by entity PID

parameters.name: is_image_for
parameters.description: filter for images by entity PID

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: which page of results to return

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: number of results in each page

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: filter for images by partner ID

parameters.name: partner_pid
parameters.description: filter for images by partner PID

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: filter for subset of images having given PID

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: filter for subset of images matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

get.description: Look inside programmes to find segments: chapters, tracks and more

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Sort direction

parameters.name: mixin
parameters.description: Mixin

parameters.name: authority
parameters.description: filter for subset of items that have an ID issued by the given authority

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: filter for subset of items having given ID

parameters.name: id_type
parameters.description: filter for subset of items that have given an ID of the given type

parameters.name: item_type
parameters.description: filter for specific type(s) of items

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: which page of results to return

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: number of results in each page

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: filter for items by partner ID

parameters.name: partner_pid
parameters.description: filter for items by partner PID

parameters.name: people
parameters.description: filter for subset of items that have specified person involved

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: filter for subset of items matching one of the given PIDs

parameters.name: programme
parameters.description: filter for subset of items that are part of the given programme

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: filter for subset of items matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

parameters.name: segment_event
parameters.description: filter for item with the given segment_event

parameters.description: Sort

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Sort direction

parameters.name: mixin
parameters.description: Mixin

parameters.name: mid
parameters.description: filter for subset of masterbrands that have given identifier

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: which page of results to return

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: number of results in each page

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: filter for masterbrands by partner ID

parameters.name: partner_pid
parameters.description: filter for masterbrands by partner PID

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: filter for subset of masterbrands matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

get.description: Find the people behind and in programmes: cast, crew, guests and more

parameters.name: authority
parameters.description: filter for subset of people that have an ID issued by the given authority

parameters.name: has_external_id
parameters.description: filter for people who have an external identifier

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: filter for subset of people having given ID

parameters.name: id_type
parameters.description: filter for subset of people that have given an ID of the given type

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: which page of results to return

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: number of results in each page

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: filter for people by partner ID

parameters.name: partner_pid
parameters.description: filter for people by partner PID

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: filter for subset of people having given PID

parameters.name: programme
parameters.description: filter for subset of people that have contributed to the given programme pid

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: filter for subset of people matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: which page of results to return

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: number of results in each page

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: filter for subset of programmes matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

parameters.name: mixin
parameters.description: Mixin

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: filter for subset of promotions belonging to a given context

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: which page of results to return

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: number of results in each page

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: filter for promotions by partner ID

parameters.name: partner_pid
parameters.description: filter for promotions by partner PID

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: filter for subset of promotions having given PID

parameters.name: promoted_by
parameters.description: filter for subset of promotions having given promoted by

parameters.name: promoted_for
parameters.description: filter for subset of promotions having given promoted for

parameters.name: q

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: filter for subset of promotions with status

get.description: Build schedules and find metadata for TV and radio broadcasts and webcasts

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Sort direction

parameters.name: mixin
parameters.description: Mixin

parameters.name: authority
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that have given authority

parameters.name: descendants_of
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that are descendants of the given programme PID

parameters.name: end_from
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that end on or later than the specified datetime

parameters.name: end_to
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that end on or earlier than the specified datetime

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that are classified in the given format ID

parameters.name: genre
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that are classified in the given genre ID

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that have programmes in the given group

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that have given identifier

parameters.name: id_type
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that have given id type

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts with the given item performed on it

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: which page of results to return

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: number of results in each page

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: filter for broadcasts and webcasts by partner ID

parameters.name: partner_pid
parameters.description: filter for broadcasts and webcasts by partner PID

parameters.name: people
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that have given contributor

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts having given PID

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

parameters.name: repeat
parameters.description: filter to show either only repeats or non-repeats

parameters.name: schedule_day
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that start on the specified day (BBC time)

parameters.name: schedule_day_from
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that start on or after the specified day (BBC time)

parameters.name: schedule_day_to
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that start on or before the specified day (BBC time)

parameters.name: service_master_brand
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts with given service master brand

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that are on the specified linear service

parameters.name: start_from
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that start on or later than the specified datetime

parameters.name: start_to
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts that start on or earlier than the specified datetime

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts and webcasts with given PID as their parent version

get.description: Information about the linear services used for broadcast transmissions

parameters.name: end_from
parameters.description: Return services that end on or later than the specified datetime

parameters.name: end_to
parameters.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that end on or earlier than the specified datetime

parameters.name: mid
parameters.description: filter for services by masterbrand MID

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: which page of results to return

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: number of results in each page

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: filter for services by partner ID

parameters.name: partner_pid
parameters.description: filter for services by partner PID

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: filter for subset of services matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

parameters.name: service_type
parameters.description: filter for specified type of linear services. one of: TV, Local Radio, National Radio, Regional Radio

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: filter for specified linear service

parameters.name: start_from
parameters.description: Return services that start on or later than the specified datetime

parameters.name: start_to
parameters.description: Return services that start earlier than the specified datetime

get.description: Metadata on editorial programme versions: original, signed, audio-described, etc

parameters.name: availability
parameters.description: filter for subset of versions that have availability

parameters.name: descendants_of
parameters.description: filter for subset of versions having given programme PID

parameters.name: media_set
parameters.description: filter for subset of versions with availability in the given media set

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: which page of results to return

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: number of results in each page

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: filter for versions by partner ID

parameters.name: partner_pid
parameters.description: filter for versions by partner PID

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: filter for subset of versions having given PID
